Package ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.control

Class SplendorRestController

java.lang.Object
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.control.SplendorRestController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*", maxAge=3600L) @RestController public class SplendorRestController extends Object
Rest controller for all API endpoints of Splendor game.

    • SplendorRestController

      public SplendorRestController(@Autowired SessionManager sessionManager, @Autowired Authentication auth, @Value("${gs.name}") String gameServiceName)
      Create an instance of Splendor's REST controller.
      Parameters:
      sessionManager - session manager
      auth - methods relating to authentication with LS
      gameServiceName - game service name

      Check if server is online.
      Returns:
      Quick statement confirming whether server is online

    • launchSession

      @PutMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}", consumes="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity launchSession(@PathVariable String sessionId, @RequestBody LaunchSessionInfo launchSessionInfo)
      Launch a session (only from lobby service).
      Parameters:
      sessionId - session id for new session
      launchSessionInfo - information about the new session
      Returns:
      HTTP response entity

    • getGameState

      @GetMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}/game", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getGameState(@PathVariable String sessionId)
      Obtain the game state of specified session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - session id to get game state of
      Returns:
      JSON object of game state

    • getPlayers

      @GetMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}/game/players", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPlayers(@PathVariable String sessionId)
      Get players in the specified game session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - game session id
      Returns:
      JSON object of players

    • getGameBoard

      @GetMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}/game/board", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getGameBoard(@PathVariable String sessionId)
      Get game board of specified session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - session id
      Returns:
      JSON object of game board

    • getActions

      @GetMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}/game/players/{playerName}/actions", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getActions(@PathVariable String sessionId, @PathVariable String playerName)
      Obtain the available actions for this turn.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - session id to get actions for
      playerName - player whose action is being put
      Returns:
      JSON object of available actions

    • putAction

      @PutMapping(value="/api/sessions/{sessionId}/game/players/{playerName}/actions/{actionIdentifier}", consumes="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> putAction(@RequestParam("access_token") String token, @PathVariable String sessionId, @PathVariable String playerName, @PathVariable Actions actionIdentifier, @RequestBody String bodyData)
      Perform an action to specified session for specified player. Will perform checks to ensure correct player is performing the action and that the player is able to perform the action.
      Parameters:
      token - access_token
      sessionId - session id
      playerName - player name who is performing action
      actionIdentifier - action identifier
      bodyData - JSON string information of action
      Returns:
      String (empty is OK)
